mapper.sql: id, lawfirm_id, name, is_active, create_time, create_id
a.id, a.lawfirm_id, a.name, a.is_active, a.create_time, a.create_id
mapper.select:
select , b.name as lawfirm_name from c_dic_lawyer a, c_dic_lawfirm b
a.lawfirm_id = b.id
AND a.is_active = '1'
AND b.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{lawfirmname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND a.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
order by ${sortItem} ${sortOrder} limit #{startNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from c_dic_lawyer where is_active = '1' AND name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') limit 0, 10
mapper.insert:
insert into c_dic_lawyer
id,
lawfirm_id,
name,
is_active,
create_time,
create_id,

mapper.update:
update c_dic_lawyer
lawfirm_id = #{lawfirmId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update c_dic_lawyer set lawfirm_id = #{lawfirmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
